VIII.i.2.B.3.f
.
Second Signature Requirement for Nehmer Rating Decisions
All
Nehmer
rating decisions require two signatures and must undergo a review by an SME prior to being processed.
Reference
:Â  For more information on two-signature ratings, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, 1.B.7
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Determining Eligibility to Retroactive Payment Under the Nehmer Stipulation
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
